lines.text: Day
Date:
, reopening its Kabul embassy + hosting Taliban's
Foreign minister for official talks.
· Filling trade vacuum, negotiating $1bn bilateral
Hade target + developing chabahar port in tran
as a corridor to Afghanistan
4.3) Backlash for triggering a refugee crisis: Pak's
diplomatic erosion in multilateral forums like
SCO/UN
· Forced deportation of 1.7M Afghan refugees has
created a humanitarian crisis, UN + India painting
Pakistan as 'aggressor', isolating it on global stage
· Key partners like China + Russia are engaging
with Taliban independently Signalling Pakistan
is no longer exclusive gatekeeper to kabul
4.4) Crisis of Credibility with China amidst CPEC and
BRI sabotage
· Shift in perception of Pakistan from an Iron Brother
to a security Liability', TTP-Baloch collusion
in attacks on Chinese nationals signals to Beijing
that Pakistan cannot guarantee security.
12 degrades Pak's Standing from 'Strategic
CamScanner
